The barometric reading at a place is 73.5m Hg. Calculate the pressure at a point 30m below the surface of water contained in a reservoir at the place. [g = 10ms\(^{-2}\), density of mercury = 1.2 x 10\(^4\)kg m\(^{-3}\), density of water = 1.0 x 10\(^3\)m\(^{-3}\)]
explanation:
The pressure at a depth of 30 m below the surface is given by: p = h\(\rho\)g
P = 30 x 1000 x 10 = 3 x 10\(^5\)Nm\(^2\)

text: The pressure applied to an enclosed fluid to one end id transmitted equally throughout the fluid and to the container walls. This statement is

What type of wave is emitted by  a loud speaker?
An object is placed 15cm from a diverging lens of focal length 12cm. The image of the object formed by the lens in
explanation:
The focal length of a diverging lens is negative.
f = -12 cm; u = 15 cm.
\(f = \frac{uv}{u + v}\)
\(-12 = \frac{15v}{15 + v}\)
\(-12 (15 + v) = 15v \implies -180 - 12v = 15v\)
\(-180 = 15v + 12v \implies -180 = 27v\)
\(v = \frac{-180}{27} = -6.67 cm\)
The image is virtual and 6.67 cm from the lens.

text: Which of the following statements about a three-pin plug is/are correct. i. The brown wire is the live wire. ii. The fuse is connected to the live wire. iii. The earth wire is coloured blue
The symbol illustrated above is that of a resistor?

options.C: which absorbs heat to function properly

explanation:
A photoresistor orlight dependent resistoris an electronic component that is sensitive to light. When light falls upon it, then the resistance changes.
Used where there is a need to sense the presence and absence of light is necessary. These resistors are used as light sensors and the applications of LDR mainly includealarm clocks, street lights, light intensity meters, burglar alarm circuits.
